body:
Trying to run `spack find -L` inside a non-empty environment (e.g.: with at least one root spec) triggers an error.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack env create test
==> Created environment 'test' in /Users/fmontag/Documents/Hacking/spack/var/spack/environments/test
$ spack env activate test
$ spack find -L
==> In environment test
==> No root specs

==> 0 installed packages
$ spack add zlib
==> Adding zlib to environment test
$ spack find
==> In environment test
==> Root specs
zlib

==> 0 installed packages
$ spack find -L
==> In environment test
==> Root specs
==> Error: can't multiply sequence by non-int of type 'NoneType'
```

 1. macOSX 10.13
 2. using a fresh clone of spack @ `26e51ff17`
title: spack find -L in non-empty environment fails
